ModMetaData.name: True Random Raids
ModMetaData.author: ISee
ModMetaData.description:
With this mod you can:
Prevent 250 Tribals from dealing damage to your FPS. Prevent Wasters from using drop pods in your settlement. Prevent Breachers from making holes in your smoothed walls. Customize the strength of raid incidents or even all incidents. Choose raid strategies and arrival modes and their chances of occurring.
Hover over each option in settings for additional information.
